lom:description.lom:string: This website teaches the user concepts about chemistry. The software is targeted towards teachers helping each other teach science. The software contains information on the following topics: - Chemistry Teaching - A-Level Chemistry - Aufbau1: Teaching Resource for 14-16 Students - Atoms, Symbols and Equations - Chemist's Art Gallery - Chemistry I - Chemistry II - Chemical Industry Teaching Resources User Site - Chemical of the Week - Chemists' Net - Chemistry Resources for Teachers - Chemistry Review - Chemistry for High School Teachers - Chemistry on the Internet - Chemistry Pointers on the WWW - Chemistry Software Exchange - Chemistry UK - Chemistry Teaching Resources - Chemweb - Frontier High School Chemistry Class - General Chemistry - High School Chemistry 250+ Links - Instructional Home Page - Molecular Dynamics - Nuclear Energy FAQ [Stanford] - Paul's Chemistry Lab - Physical Chemistry Hypermedia Resources - Quantum Mechanics - Reference Guide for Minerals - Teaching Resources - The Learning Matters of Chemistry - The World of Materials - The world of Physical Chemistry - Teaching Chemistry on the Web - Theory of Atoms in Molecules - Understanding Our Planet Through Chemistry - Virtual Chemistry Lab - WWW Links for Chemists - WWW Links for Chemistry - Analytical Chemistry - Analytical Chemistry Basics - Analytical Chemistry I and II - Analytical Chemistry and Instrumentation - Basic Liquid Chromatography - Chemical Separation - GC/MS for Chromatographers - Introduction to Analytical Chemistry - Radioanalytical Methods - Spectroscopy - X-Ray Diffraction - The Periodic Table - Basic Atomic Information - Electron Binding Energies - Periodic Table of the Elements - Periodic Table Programme - The Periodic Table : metallic elements - The Periodic Table:bonds - Web-Elements - Organic Chemistry - General Organic and Biochemistry - Introduction to Organic Chemistry - Organic Chemistry Introduction - Molecular Modelling - Concepts in Science Through Molecular Modeling - Molecular Modelling - Representation Models in Molecular Graphics

lom:title.lom:string: Association for Science Education: Chemistry Links for Teachers
